name: Plot
description: A super simple browserify-based starter template for wordpress projects.

scripts.cssmake: postcss --use autoprefixer -c postcss.json < assets/css/style.css | postcss --use cssnano > assets/css/style.min.css
scripts.jsmake: browserify src/js/main.js --debug > assets/js/main.js && uglifyjs -c -m -- assets/js/main.js > assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.observe: concurrently 'npm run cssobs' 'npm run jsobs' 'npm run reload'
scripts.adminobserve: concurrently 'npm run admincssobs' 'npm run adminjsobs' 'npm run reload'

author: Michael Watson
